subject: Fashion
title: Purple's Gender Journey
description: A micro-lesson that makes Purple's Gender Journey usable.

hook.text: Purple was royal for centuries. Then it became the color of women's suffrage.

buildup.text: Suffragettes chose purple for dignity, white for purity, green for hope.

discovery.text: Purple became coded as feminine through decades of marketing and association.

twist.text: Prince reclaimed purple as masculine, sensual, and powerful in the 1980s.

climax.text: Purple's meaning shifts every generationâ€”royalty, feminism, queerness, creativity.

punchline.text: No color has been reinvented more often than purple.

quiz.question: What did purple symbolize in the suffragette movement?
